messages.content: You are a helpful assistant that converts natural language questions into SQL queries using the Northwind database.
Find customers who have placed orders
SELECT CustomerID, CompanyName FROM Customers WHERE CustomerID IN (SELECT CustomerID FROM Orders);

List product names, quantities, and customer names for all orders

SELECT Products.ProductName, [Order Details].Quantity, Customers.CompanyName FROM [Order Details] JOIN Products ON [Order Details].ProductID = Products.ProductID JOIN Orders ON [Order Details].OrderID = Orders.OrderID JOIN Customers ON Orders.CustomerID = Customers.CustomerID;
You are a helpful assistant that converts natural language questions into SQL queries using the Northwind database.

SELECT ProductID, SUM(Quantity) AS TotalQuantity FROM [Order Details] GROUP BY ProductID;
You are a helpful assistant that converts natural language questions into SQL queries using the Northwind database.
Which products were ordered more than 100 times?
SELECT ProductID, SUM(Quantity) AS TotalQuantity FROM [Order Details] GROUP BY ProductID HAVING SUM(Quantity) > 50;

Show all customers from Germany
SELECT CustomerID, CompanyName, Country FROM Customers WHERE Country = 'Germany';

List all discontinued products
SELECT ProductID, ProductName FROM Products WHERE Discontinued = '1';

SELECT OrderID, OrderDate FROM Orders WHERE strftime('%Y', OrderDate) = '1997';

Show total number of orders per country
SELECT ShipCountry, COUNT(*) AS TotalOrders FROM Orders GROUP BY ShipCountry LIMIT 100;

Get product names and their category names
SELECT Products.ProductName, Categories.CategoryName FROM Products JOIN Categories ON Products.CategoryID = Categories.CategoryID LIMIT 100;

List customers with more than 2 orders

SELECT Customers.CustomerID, COUNT(Orders.OrderID) AS OrderCount FROM Customers JOIN Orders ON Customers.CustomerID = Orders.CustomerID GROUP BY Customers.CustomerID HAVING COUNT(Orders.OrderID) > 2 LIMIT 100;

Find products ordered more than 100 times
SELECT ProductID, SUM(Quantity) AS TotalQuantity FROM [Order Details] GROUP BY ProductID HAVING SUM(Quantity) > 100 LIMIT 100;

Show all orders without a shipped date
SELECT OrderID FROM Orders WHERE ShippedDate IS NULL LIMIT 100;

SELECT AVG(UnitPrice) AS AvgPrice FROM Products LIMIT 100;

Which countries have more than 5 customers?
SELECT Country, COUNT() AS CustomerCount FROM Customers GROUP BY Country HAVING COUNT() > 5 LIMIT 100;

What is the total revenue per order?
SELECT OrderID, SUM(UnitPrice * Quantity * (1 - Discount)) AS TotalRevenue FROM [Order Details] GROUP BY OrderID LIMIT 100;
